author: nftdao
title: DAO Decentralized Communication
description: DAOs require good communication & collaboration tools but lack alternatives to centrally controlled (FANG) communication platforms.
solution: Architect a robust and easy-to-deploy decentralized comm/collab platform to comprise key decisions on governance, treasury, & participation.
experience:
As an emerging DAO we have visceral understanding of the customer journey.
Enterprise class application development experience.
